title: Order Import with Unique Tracking ID Generation
description: Verify that orders can be bulk imported correctly, each generating a unique tracking ID with no duplicates, and invalid entries are rejected.

steps.description: Bulk import a valid CSV file containing multiple orders.
Check that each imported order has a unique tracking ID.
Verify that the system rejects orders with missing mandatory fields and shows appropriate validation errors.
Import a CSV file containing duplicate orders.
Confirm that duplicates are detected and prevented from being imported.

title: Manual Order Creation and Editing with Validation
description: Test manual creation and editing of orders ensuring validations are enforced and unique tracking IDs are maintained.

steps.description: Navigate to order creation form.
Enter valid order details and save.
Verify order is created with a unique tracking ID.
Edit an existing order with valid changes and save.
Confirm order updates are saved and tracking ID remains unchanged.
Attempt to enter invalid data or duplicate tracking ID.
Verify form validation errors and prevention of duplicate tracking IDs.

title: Main Sheet Inventory Status Updates and Auto-Move
description: Verify that inventory parts update their status correctly in the Main Sheet, auto-move to next workflow stages works, and locking prevents accidental edits.

steps.description: Change part status through lifecycle stages manually.
Confirm that status updates reflect accurately with visual indicators.
Trigger part reaching arrival status to test auto-move to next stage.
Verify auto-move happens as expected.
Attempt to edit a locked part status.
Ensure edit is prevented when lock is active.

title: Customer Contact Queue and Note Attachment
description: Test the Call List feature to ensure customer contact queues form correctly with the ability to track status and attach notes.

steps.description: Add parts reaching arrival status to customer contact queue.
Confirm customers appear in call list with correct status.
Attach notes to a customer contact entry.
Verify notes are saved and visible in the call list.
Mark contact as completed and update status.
Ensure status updates and reflects in UI correctly.

title: Booking Calendar Multi-VIN Grouping and Color-Coded Indicators
description: Validate the booking calendar functionality including multi-VIN grouping, color-coded status indicators, and retention of booking history for two years.

steps.description: Book an appointment with multiple VINs grouped under a single booking.
Verify grouped VINs appear correctly and booking shows color-coded status.
Check booking history retention by viewing bookings older than one year but less than two years.
Confirm booking history is accessible and data is accurate.
Load calendar UI and observe response time.
Verify calendar loads with latency under 100ms to meet performance benchmarks.

title: Notification System with Numbered Badges and Metadata
description: Ensure the notification system delivers accurate alerts with numbered badges, detailed metadata, and navigation to the originating order or booking.

steps.description: Trigger system events that generate notifications (e.g., order status change, booking updates).
Check notification count badges update correctly.
Verify notifications display detailed metadata relevant to the event.
Click on a notification.
Confirm navigation to the source record (order, booking, etc.) occurs correctly.

title: Cross-Tab Search Across Multiple Fields with Advanced Filters
description: Verify search functionality supports queries across VIN, Customer Name, Part Number, and Company with advanced filtering and direct navigation from results.

steps.description: Enter search queries targeting each field individually (VIN, Customer Name, Part Number, Company).
Check that relevant results appear for each query.
Apply advanced filters (date ranges, status, booking availability) on search results.
Confirm filters narrow down results correctly.
Select a search result item and trigger navigation.
Verify user is directed to the corresponding order or booking screen.

title: Archive and History Module with Immutable Records and Reorder Capability
description: Test that archived data maintains immutable audit trails, complies with 48-hour retention policies, and allows reordering from archives with correct data restoration.

steps.description: Archive completed order records.
Ensure archived records are immutable and audit trail is preserved.
Attempt to edit archived records.
Verify edits are disallowed.
Wait beyond 48 hours and verify records comply with retention policy for archival accessibility.
Initiate reorder from historical record.
Confirm reorder is correctly populated and new order is created with unique tracking ID.

title: UI/UX Responsiveness and Training Efficiency
description: Validate overall UI/UX responsiveness with latency under 100ms and assess if UI elements support minimal training time and efficiency.

steps.description: Measure response times across major user interactions (order creation, editing, booking calendar navigation, search filtering).
Confirm interactions are responsive within 100ms latency.
Perform exploratory testing to evaluate UI intuitiveness and ease of use for new users.
Validate UI layout, labeling, and feedback minimize training requirements.

title: Error Handling for Data Import and Status Updates
description: Test system behavior when invalid data is imported or invalid status updates are attempted, ensuring clear error messages and prevention of faulty data.

steps.description: Attempt to import orders with malformed CSV format.
Verify import fails gracefully with descriptive error.
Try to update part status to an invalid or unsupported status.
Check error modal or message is shown and invalid update is prevented.
Attempt to remove lock on a part without proper permissions.
Confirm system denies the action and shows an appropriate error.

title: Mobile Accessibility and Responsive Design
description: Verify the platformâ€™s UI renders correctly and all functionalities work on mobile devices with various screen sizes.

steps.description: Access the system on multiple mobile devices including different screen sizes.
Ensure all pages (Orders, Booking Calendar, Main Sheet, Notifications, Search) render properly without layout issues.
Perform key workflows such as order creation, booking, searching, and notification handling on mobile.
Confirm features function properly with acceptable performance on mobile.
